children.html:
This week features a total of 15 games on the Switch, including the critically-acclaimed Outlast 2.

So let’s get right into it…

 

Note: All prices are in USD and all release dates are for the North American eShop. Also, releases can still be subjected to change after the release of this update.

 

Outlast 2

Release Date 03/27/18

Price $29.99

Developed By Red Barrels

Published By Red Barrels

Genre Action / Adventure

Required Space 9.6 GB

Players 1

Also Released On PC / Mac / PS4 / Xbox One

Outlast 2 introduces you to Sullivan Knoth who has created Temple Gate, a town deep in the wilderness and is away from civilisation. In Outlast 2, you play as Blake Langermann who has found himself in the thick of the mayhem.

 

D/Generation HD

Release Date 03/27/18

Price $9.99

Developed By West Coast Software

Published By West Coast Software

Genre Arcade / Puzzle / Adventure / Shooter

Required Space 1.8 GB

Players 1

Also Released On iOS / Android

A nameless courier arrives in London via his Jet-Pack and must get the package to the recipient as soon as possible. Traverse interconnected rooms (scenes) and continue to ascend through the tower by accomplishing various tasks along the way.

 

Warp Shift

Release Date 03/27/18

Price $9.99

Developed By Isbit Games

Published By Isbit Games

Genre Puzzle

Required Space 794 MB

Players 1

Also Released On iOS / Android

Warp Shift is a unique puzzle game that relies on you to challenge your mind and stimulate your senses. Guide Pi and her magical companion through cube-based mazes. With no time limit across five worlds (15 levels in each), take your time and enjoy the picturesque visuals and beautiful soundtrack.

 

Zombillie

Unfortunately, we couldn’t find an official trailer for Zombillie. We apologise for the inconvenience.

Release Date 03/29/18

Price $4.99

Published By Forever Entertainment

Genre Puzzle / Arcade

Required Space 311 MB

Players 1

Also Released On PC / iOS / Android

Play as Zombillie who lived in a humble cave, hunting for meat. As he ate, he grew, but now he is running out of meat! Help Zombillie reach the legendary meat farm with over 90 complex levels full of puzzles and traps.

 

Johnny Turbo’s Arcade: Bad Dudes

Unfortunately, we couldn’t find an official trailer for Johnny Turbo’s Arcade: Bad Dudes. We apologise for the inconvenience.

Release Date 03/29/18

Price $7.99

Developed By Flying Tiger Entertainment, Inc.

Published By FTE Games

Genre Action / Arcade / Fighting / Multiplayer

Required Space 57.0 MB

Players 1 – 2

Also Released On Arcade

This game recreates the classic arcade fighting genre in this side-scrolling brawler. President Ronnie has been kidnapped by ninjas, and the Bad Dudes must pursue the ninjas through the New York City streets.

 

ClusterPuck 99

Release Date 03/29/18

Price $9.99

Published By Coatsink Software

Genre Multiplayer / Party / Arcade / Sports

Required Space 234 MB

Players 1 – 8

Also Released On PC / Xbox One

ClusterPuck 99 is a top-down competitive sports game that you can play with your friends and family. It can be played with up to 8 players across 30 maps and is perfect for players of all ages. Bash your opponents to gain control of the puck and then fight your way to their goal whilst avoiding spikes and using speed boosts.

 

Gotcha Racing 2nd

Release Date 03/29/18

Price $9.99

Published By Arc System Works

Genre Racing / Action

Required Space 459 MB

Players 1 – 4

Also Released On 3DS

Customize your own vehicle with parts that you get from gacha machines (featuring approximately 700 different parts!). Win races and aim for the top of the Grand Prix with your custom designed little racer. There are 16 different courses and solo and multiplayer game modes.

 

The Charming Empire

Release Date 03/29/18

Price $24.99

Published By D3 Publisher

Genre Adventure

Required Space 515 MB

Players 1

Also Released On PC / iOS / Android

This dating simulation game is set in the Taisho Roman era of Japan. Amane Kosaka was living in a countryside until she was suddenly summoned by her brother and ruler, Soshi Amazaki, to live in the empire. With a brand new world to explore that is completely foreign to her, she must face the challenges that lay ahead.

 

The Adventures of Bertram Fiddle: Episode 1: A Dreadly Business

Release Date 03/29/18

Price $4.99

Published By Chorus Worldwide Games

Genre Adventure / Puzzle

Required Space 986 MB

Players 1

Also Released On PC / iOS

This quirky game is packed full of three things: intrigue, mystery and terrible puns. With the visuals from Rumpus Animation, this game takes place in Victorian London and is inhabited by strange characters with even stranger noses. Lead Bertram Fiddle in a point-and-click and held him follow the clues and track down the elusive serial killer known as Geoff the Murderer (makes sense). With over 30 locations to explore featuring beautifully animated interactions, this may be a game to keep on your radar.

 

Tengai for Nintendo Switch

Release Date 03/29/18

Price $7.99

Published By Zerodiv

Genre Arcade / Shooter

Required Space 67.0 MB

Players 1 – 2

Also Released On ARC / Sega Saturn / PS2 / iOS / Android

The classic Tengai is coming to the Nintendo Switch. A great commander’s evil power has extending to neighboring countries and it is up to you to stop him in this side-scrolling shooter.

 

Toki Tori

Release Date 03/30/18

Price $4.49

Developed By Two Tribes

Published By Two Tribes Publishing

Genre Puzzle / Platformer

Required Space 127 MB

Players 1

Also Released On PC / Linux / Mac / PS4 / Wii U

With over 80 levels spread over five worlds to explore, this puzzle platformer relies on your creative thinking. Control a not-so athletic chicken with an arsenal of tools at his disposal, including the Telewarp, Freeze-o-Matic and InstantRock.

 

Alteric

Unfortunately, we couldn’t find an official trailer for Alteric. We apologise for the inconvenience.

Release Date 03/30/18

Price $4.49

Developed By Sometimes You

Published By Sometimes You

Genre Platformer / Arcade / Puzzle

Required Space 112 MB

Players 1

Also Released On PC / PS4 / PS Vita

Alteric is a single player 2D-platformer that features bright minimalistic graphics and hardcore gameplay with physics, gravity and logic. Play as a man who has recently died but his soul remains as a piece of light energy that is trapped in the alien space between two worlds.

 

Shadow Bug

Release Date 03/30/18

Price $8.99

Published By Muro Studios

Genre Platformer / Action / Adventure / Puzzle

Required Space 809 MB

Players 1

Also Released On PC / iOS / Android

Shadow Bug features beautifully melancholy artwork in a platform adventure. Play as the ultimate ninja through 36 hand crafted levels that require you to move only by attacking enemies.

 

Farm Expert 2018 for Nintendo Switch

Unfortunately, we couldn’t find an official trailer for Farm Expert 2018 for Nintendo Switch. We apologise for the inconvenience.

Release Date 03/30/18

Price $29.99

Developed By SimFabric Sp. z o.o.

Published By SimFabric

Genre Simulation / Strategy / Adventure / RPG

Required Space 262 MB

Players 1

Also Released On iOS / Android

Plow, fertilize, harvest grain, breed cows, grow fruit orchards and buy and sell resources on your very own farm. This game features over 20 unique agricultural machines and four open worlds. There is hours worth of content with a store to buy the necessary materials and machines.

 

Spartan

Release Date 04/01/18

Price $11.99

Published By Sinister Cyclops

Genre Platformer / Arcade / Action

Required Space 725 MB

Players 1

Also Released On PC / PS4 / Xbox One

Set in Sparta, 500 BC, play as King Leo, seek vengeance on those responsible for the magical portals appearing throughout ancient Greece and recover everything that was stolen. Spartan features over 20 hours of intense gameplay that spans across four distinct worlds and 24 challenging levels.

 

Switchaboo Pick of the Week

Unfortunately this week has been a bit lackluster in comparison to weeks just gone, but we still have a very prominent Pick of the Week to announce. And that game is…

Drum roll, please…

Outlast 2!

Shocking, we know…

But Outlast 2 deserves all of the credit that we can give it. Being the sequel to the first game that surprisingly dropped on the Switch eShop a few weeks ago, Outlast 2 shows that more and more third-parties are doing whatever they can to get their games on the platform.

We also have to give a special mention to The Adventures of Bertram Fiddle: Episode 1: A Dreadly Business, just because it looks hilarious.

 

If you’d like to keep track of future releases and exciting Nintendo Switch related articles, click here to visit our Facebook Page and perhaps even give us a like and a follow.
